ygData.subject: RE: [shadowknight] Hey There!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Just wait till you get spells.  Up till now you have pretty much been a warrior.  You are about to see what being a shadowknight really means. HSK 24 Sol Ro
ygData.messageBody:
Just wait till you get spells. Up till now you have pretty much been a
warrior. You are about to see what being a shadowknight really means.

HSK 24
Sol Ro

-----Original Message-----
From: James Jones [mailto:jjones@...]
Sent: Tuesday, June 27, 2000 6:41 AM
To: shadowknight@egroups.com
Subject: [shadowknight] Hey There!!!


Hi,

My names James and I thought I'de just say Hi!

I've been playing for around 2 weeks now and have built up a level 8 nearly
9 Shadow Knight. Great fun all round!!!

James(Goraknor the Troll)
